hero.tagline: We design and ship edge-AI applications and the tooling that makes them deployable in the real world.

capabilities.title: Edge app prototyping
capabilities.desc: Swift and JS starters, audio pipelines, and UI scaffolds to ship fast.

capabilities.title: Quantization & deploy
capabilities.desc: Tooling to shrink, optimize, and ship models across devices.

capabilities.title: Docs & developer UX
capabilities.desc: Clear docs, examples, and SDKs—so teams can actually use it.

mission: Turn powerful models into reliable, privacy-respecting products that run close to the user— with the shortest path from idea to value.
